section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-e4b568a elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.p: With the announcement of a state of emergency for Alaska and the closing of many events and institutions across the state and nation, there has been heightened concern for our students.

We will continue to work closely with Alaska’s Commissioner of Education, Alaska’s Department of Health and Social Services, and will continue to keep this page updated with our District’s latest information as it becomes available. Thank you for your patience, perseverance, and teamwork as we work through the incredible challenges posed by this situation.
Please see below and click the links for the latest information from our administrators.
